quiz.question: exuberant ___________
quiz.explanation: 充满活力的,充满活力的个性。Her exuberant personality lit up every room she entered.她充满活力的个性照亮了她进入的每个房间。

quiz.question: flagrant ____
quiz.explanation: 公然的,公然犯规。The referee called a flagrant foul after the aggressive tackle.裁判在激烈的铲球后判了公然犯规。

quiz.question: _________ vagrant
quiz.explanation: 流浪者,流浪的流浪者。The wandering vagrant sought shelter from the cold winter night.流浪的流浪者在寒冷的冬夜寻找庇护所。

quiz.question: arrant ________
quiz.explanation: 彻头彻尾的,彻头彻尾的胡说。His excuse was arrant nonsense that nobody believed.他的借口是彻头彻尾的胡说,没人相信。

quiz.question: ___ currant
quiz.explanation: 醋栗,红醋栗。The baker used red currants to decorate the top of the cake.面包师用红醋栗装饰蛋糕顶部。

quiz.question: ___ entrant
quiz.explanation: 参赛者,新参赛者。The new entrant showed surprising skill in the competition.新参赛者在比赛中展现了惊人的技巧。

quiz.question: pheasant _______
quiz.explanation: 野鸡,野鸡狩猎。The aristocrats enjoyed pheasant hunting on their country estate.贵族们喜欢在他们的乡村庄园进行野鸡狩猎。

quiz.question: resultant _____
quiz.explanation: 合成的,合力。The resultant force determined the object's final direction of movement.合力决定了物体最终的运动方向。

quiz.question: exultant ______
quiz.explanation: 欢欣鼓舞的,欢欣鼓舞的欢呼。Exultant cheers erupted from the crowd when the goal was scored.进球时,人群中爆发出欢欣鼓舞的欢呼声。

quiz.question: contestant ______
quiz.explanation: 参赛者,获胜的参赛者。The contestant winner received a trophy and cash prize.获胜的参赛者获得了奖杯和现金奖励。

quiz.question: buoyant ____
quiz.explanation: 愉快的,愉快的心情。She was in a buoyant mood after hearing the good news.听到好消息后,她心情愉快。

quiz.question: complacent ________
quiz.explanation: 自满的,自满的态度。His complacent attitude prevented him from improving his skills.他自满的态度阻止了他提高技能。

quiz.question: indecent ________
quiz.explanation: 不雅的,不雅暴露。The actor was arrested for indecent exposure in a public park.这位演员因在公园不雅暴露而被逮捕。

quiz.question: ________ ascent
quiz.explanation: 攀登,登山。The mountain ascent took three days of difficult climbing.登山花了三天艰难的攀爬。

quiz.question: incandescent ____
quiz.explanation: 白炽的,白炽灯。The old incandescent lamp was replaced with an energy-efficient LED bulb.旧的白炽灯被节能的LED灯泡取代了。

quiz.question: opalescent _____
quiz.explanation: 乳白色的,乳白色光泽。The pearl had a beautiful opalescent sheen in the sunlight.珍珠在阳光下呈现出美丽的乳白色光泽。

quiz.question: convalescent _______
quiz.explanation: 康复中的,康复中的病人。The convalescent patient needed several weeks of rest at home.康复中的病人需要在家休息几周。

quiz.question: reminiscent ____
quiz.explanation: 怀旧的,怀旧的语调。She spoke in a reminiscent tone about her childhood summers.她用怀旧的语调谈论她童年的夏天。

quiz.question: translucent _____
quiz.explanation: 半透明的,半透明的玻璃。The bathroom window was made of translucent glass for privacy.浴室窗户用半透明的玻璃制成以保护隐私。

quiz.question: resplendent ______
quiz.explanation: 华丽的,华丽的宫殿。The resplendent palace gleamed with gold and precious jewels.华丽的宫殿闪耀着黄金和珍贵宝石的光芒。

quiz.question: _______ gent
quiz.explanation: 绅士,完美的绅士。He was a perfect gent, always holding doors and offering his seat.他是一个完美的绅士,总是开门并让座。

quiz.question: indulgent ______
quiz.explanation: 溺爱的,溺爱的父母。The indulgent parent bought his child every toy she wanted.溺爱的父母给孩子买了她想要的每个玩具。

quiz.question: _______ detergent
quiz.explanation: 洗涤剂,洗衣液。She poured laundry detergent into the washing machine.她将洗衣液倒入洗衣机。

quiz.question: obedient ___
quiz.explanation: 顺从的,顺从的狗。The obedient dog sat quietly waiting for its owner's command.顺从的狗安静地坐着等待主人的命令。

quiz.question: _____ relent
quiz.explanation: 减弱,风暴减弱。The storm finally began to relent after hours of heavy rain.经过数小时的大雨后,风暴终于开始减弱。

quiz.question: insolent ______
quiz.explanation: 无礼的,无礼的评论。The student was punished for making an insolent remark to the teacher.学生因对老师发表无礼的评论而受到惩罚。

quiz.question: malevolent ______
quiz.explanation: 恶意的,恶意的幽灵。The haunted house was said to contain a malevolent spirit.据说这座闹鬼的房子里有一个恶意的幽灵。

quiz.question: turbulent _____
quiz.explanation: 汹涌的,汹涌的波浪。The ship struggled through the turbulent waves during the storm.暴风雨期间,船只在汹涌的波浪中挣扎前行。

quiz.question: corpulent ___
quiz.explanation: 肥胖的,肥胖的男人。The corpulent man huffed and puffed climbing the stairs.肥胖的男人爬楼梯时气喘吁吁。

quiz.question: lament ____
quiz.explanation: 哀悼,哀悼损失。The community gathered to lament loss of their beloved leader.社区聚集在一起哀悼他们敬爱的领导人的逝世。

quiz.question: ____ temperament
quiz.explanation: 性情,平静的性情。Her calm temperament helped her handle stressful situations well.她平静的性情帮助她很好地处理压力情况。

quiz.question: ______ estrangement
quiz.explanation: 疏远,家庭疏远。The family estrangement lasted for years after the bitter argument.在激烈的争吵后,家庭疏远持续了多年。

quiz.question: vehement ________
quiz.explanation: 激烈的,激烈的争论。They engaged in a vehement argument about political differences.他们就政治分歧进行了激烈的争论。

quiz.question: ______ battlement
quiz.explanation: 城垛,城堡城垛。Archers stood ready on the castle battlement to defend against attack.弓箭手在城堡城垛上准备好抵御攻击。

quiz.question: _____ __ puzzlement
quiz.explanation: 困惑,困惑状态。The cryptic message left her in a state of puzzlement.这条神秘的信息让她陷入困惑状态。

quiz.question: ______ disfigurement
quiz.explanation: 毁容,面部毁容。The accident caused severe facial disfigurement requiring reconstructive surgery.事故造成严重的面部毁容,需要重建手术。

quiz.question: understatement _____
quiz.explanation: 轻描淡写,轻描淡写的幽默。British comedy is known for its understatement humor and dry wit.英国喜剧以其轻描淡写的幽默和冷幽默而闻名。

quiz.question: ____ figment
quiz.explanation: 虚构,纯粹的虚构。The ghost was a mere figment of his overactive imagination.鬼魂只是他过度活跃想象力的纯粹虚构。

quiz.question: astonishment _____
quiz.explanation: 惊讶,惊讶的人群。The astonishment crowd gasped as the magician performed the impossible trick.当魔术师表演不可能的戏法时,惊讶的人群倒吸一口气。

quiz.question: concealment ______
quiz.explanation: 隐藏,隐藏装置。The spy used a clever concealment device to hide the documents.间谍使用巧妙的隐藏装置来隐藏文件。

quiz.question: _____ consignment
quiz.explanation: 托运,货物托运。The goods consignment arrived damaged after the long journey.货物托运在长途运输后到达时已损坏。

quiz.question: _____ bewilderment
quiz.explanation: 困惑,完全的困惑。He stared in utter bewilderment at the complex instructions.他带着完全的困惑盯着复杂的说明。

quiz.question: _____ __ wonderment
quiz.explanation: 惊奇,惊奇感。The child gazed at the stars with a sense of wonderment.孩子带着惊奇感凝视着星星。

quiz.question: ________ torment
quiz.explanation: 折磨,持续的折磨。The chronic pain was a constant torment that never ceased.慢性疼痛是从未停止的持续折磨。

quiz.question: _____ enchantment
quiz.explanation: 魔法,仙女的魔法。The princess fell under a fairy enchantment that made her sleep for a hundred years.公主陷入了仙女的魔法,让她沉睡了一百年。

quiz.question: ____ contentment
quiz.explanation: 满足,深深的满足。She felt deep contentment watching her grandchildren play.看着孙子们玩耍,她感到深深的满足。

quiz.question: impertinent _____
quiz.explanation: 无礼的,无礼的孩子。The impertinent child talked back rudely to adults.无礼的孩子粗鲁地顶撞成年人。

quiz.question: ____ assent
quiz.explanation: 同意,给予同意。The committee will give assent to the proposal at tomorrow's meeting.委员会将在明天的会议上给予提案同意。

quiz.question: ____ portent
quiz.explanation: 预兆,不祥的预兆。The ravens circling overhead seemed a dark portent of coming doom.头顶盘旋的乌鸦似乎是即将到来厄运的不祥预兆。

quiz.question: ________ delinquent
quiz.explanation: 少年犯,青少年罪犯。The juvenile delinquent was sent to a reform school for rehabilitation.青少年罪犯被送到改造学校进行改造。

quiz.question: fervent _________
quiz.explanation: 热情的,热情的支持者。She was a fervent supporter of environmental protection causes.她是环保事业的热情支持者。

quiz.question: repaint ____
quiz.explanation: 重新粉刷,重新粉刷墙壁。We need to repaint wall after the water damage is repaired.水损修复后,我们需要重新粉刷墙壁。

quiz.question: ______ taint
quiz.explanation: 污染,毒物污染。The food had a poison taint that made everyone sick.食物有毒物污染,使每个人都生病了。

quiz.question: ______ feint
quiz.explanation: 佯攻,拳击佯攻。The boxer used a clever boxing feint to deceive his opponent.拳击手使用巧妙的拳击佯攻来欺骗对手。

quiz.question: ___ glint
quiz.explanation: 闪光,阳光闪光。The sun glint off the metal roof was almost blinding.金属屋顶的阳光闪光几乎令人目眩。

quiz.question: ____ splint
quiz.explanation: 夹板,木制夹板。The doctor applied a wood splint to the broken finger.医生给骨折的手指使用了木制夹板。

quiz.question: disjoint ______
quiz.explanation: 脱节的,脱节的努力。Their disjoint effort lacked coordination and failed to achieve the goal.他们脱节的努力缺乏协调,未能实现目标。

quiz.question: newsprint _____
quiz.explanation: 新闻纸,新闻用纸。The old photograph was wrapped in yellowed newsprint paper.旧照片用发黄的新闻用纸包着。

quiz.question: ___ squint
quiz.explanation: 斜视,眼睛斜视。He developed an eye squint from staring at computer screens too long.他因长时间盯着电脑屏幕而出现眼睛斜视。

quiz.question: ____ affront
quiz.explanation: 冒犯,公然冒犯。The insulting comment was an open affront to her dignity.侮辱性的评论是对她尊严的公然冒犯。

quiz.question: gaunt ______
quiz.explanation: 憔悴的,憔悴的身影。The illness left him a gaunt figure of his former self.疾病让他成为了昔日自己的憔悴身影。

quiz.question: haunt _____
quiz.explanation: 闹鬼,闹鬼的房子。The abandoned mansion was rumored to haunt house on the hill.据传那座废弃的豪宅是山上闹鬼的房子。

quiz.question: _______ jaunt
quiz.explanation: 短途旅行,周末短途旅行。We took a weekend jaunt to the countryside for relaxation.我们进行了周末短途旅行到乡下放松。

quiz.question: _____ taunt
quiz.explanation: 嘲弄,愤怒的嘲弄。The bully's angry taunt brought tears to the young child's eyes.恶霸愤怒的嘲弄让小孩子眼中充满泪水。

quiz.question: __________ manhunt
quiz.explanation: 搜捕,全国性搜捕。Police launched a nationwide manhunt for the escaped convict.警方对逃犯展开了全国性搜捕。

quiz.question: _____ shunt
quiz.explanation: 调车,火车调车。Workers had to train shunt the carriages onto a different track.工人们必须将车厢调车到不同的轨道上。

quiz.question: ____ recount
quiz.explanation: 重新计票,选票重新计票。The close election results triggered an automatic vote recount.接近的选举结果触发了自动选票重新计票。

quiz.question: ____ fount
quiz.explanation: 源泉,圣水池。Pilgrims drank from the holy fount seeking spiritual healing.朝圣者从圣水池喝水寻求精神治愈。

quiz.question: dismount _____
quiz.explanation: 下马,从马上下来。The rider had to dismount horse to cross the narrow bridge.骑手必须从马上下来才能穿过狭窄的桥。

quiz.question: _____ grunt
quiz.explanation: 苦差,繁重的工作。The new intern was assigned all the grunt work nobody else wanted.新实习生被分配了所有其他人都不想做的繁重工作。

quiz.question: ____ mascot
quiz.explanation: 吉祥物,球队吉祥物。The team mascot entertained the crowd during halftime.球队吉祥物在中场休息时娱乐观众。

quiz.question: ____ bloodshot
quiz.explanation: 充血的,眼睛充血。His eyes bloodshot from lack of sleep made him look exhausted.他因缺乏睡眠而眼睛充血,看起来筋疲力尽。

quiz.question: _____ upshot
quiz.explanation: 结果,最终结果。The final upshot of the negotiations was a mutually beneficial agreement.谈判的最终结果是一项互利的协议。

quiz.question: ______ earshot
quiz.explanation: 听力范围,听力范围内。They waited until the boss was within earshot before making the announcement.他们等到老板在听力范围内才宣布消息。

quiz.question: ____ _ jot
quiz.explanation: 记下,做记录。Let me make a jot of that important phone number.让我记下那个重要的电话号码。

quiz.question: ___ blot
quiz.explanation: 墨迹,墨水污渍。An ink blot on the page ruined the otherwise perfect essay.纸上的墨水污渍毁了原本完美的文章。

quiz.question: scoot ____
quiz.explanation: 快速移动,快速离开。The mouse tried to scoot away when it saw the cat approaching.老鼠看到猫靠近时试图快速离开。

quiz.question: underfoot _____
quiz.explanation: 在脚下,脚下的杂草。The underfoot weeds made walking through the garden difficult.脚下的杂草使得在花园里行走变得困难。

quiz.question: ___ hoot
quiz.explanation: 猫头鹰叫声,猫头鹰的叫声。The owl hoot echoed through the dark forest at night.猫头鹰的叫声在夜晚的黑暗森林中回荡。

quiz.question: uproot ____
quiz.explanation: 连根拔起,连根拔起树木。The hurricane was strong enough to uproot tree that had stood for decades.飓风强大到足以连根拔起已矗立数十年的树木。

quiz.question: _____ soot
quiz.explanation: 烟灰,黑色烟灰。Black soot covered the fireplace walls after years of use.多年使用后,黑色烟灰覆盖了壁炉墙壁。

quiz.question: repot _____
quiz.explanation: 换盆,给植物换盆。Spring is the best time to repot plant that have outgrown their containers.春天是给长得太大的植物换盆的最佳时机。

quiz.question: _____ crackpot
quiz.explanation: 怪人,疯狂的怪人。The crazy crackpot claimed to have invented a time machine.这个疯狂的怪人声称发明了时间机器。

quiz.question: inkpot ____
quiz.explanation: 墨水瓶,墨水池。The old inkpot well sat on the Victorian writing desk.旧墨水池放在维多利亚时代的写字台上。

quiz.question: tinpot ________
quiz.explanation: 无能的,无能的独裁者。The tinpot dictator ruled through fear and corruption.无能的独裁者通过恐惧和腐败进行统治。

quiz.question: _____ trot
quiz.explanation: 快步,马快步。The horse began to trot faster as they approached the stable.当他们接近马厩时,马开始快步跑得更快。

quiz.question: ____ rapt
quiz.explanation: 全神贯注的,全神贯注。The children listened with rapt attention to the storyteller.孩子们全神贯注地听故事讲述者讲故事。

quiz.question: nondescript ___
quiz.explanation: 平凡的,平凡的男人。The nondescript man blended easily into the crowd.这个平凡的男人很容易融入人群。

quiz.question: unkempt ____
quiz.explanation: 凌乱的,凌乱的头发。His unkempt hair suggested he had just rolled out of bed.他凌乱的头发表明他刚从床上爬起来。

quiz.question: tempt ____
quiz.explanation: 诱惑,挑战命运。Don't tempt fate by driving recklessly in bad weather.不要在恶劣天气鲁莽驾驶来挑战命运。

quiz.question: abrupt ____
quiz.explanation: 突然的,突然停止。The car came to an abrupt stop when the deer ran across the road.当鹿跑过马路时,汽车突然停止。

quiz.question: disrupt _______
quiz.explanation: 破坏,破坏服务。The power outage will disrupt service for several hours.停电将破坏服务几个小时。

quiz.question: ____ braggart
quiz.explanation: 吹牛者,大声的吹牛者。The loud braggart constantly boasted about his achievements.这个大声的吹牛者不断吹嘘他的成就。

quiz.question: _____ tart
quiz.explanation: 馅饼,甜馅饼。The bakery's sweet tart filled with fresh berries was delicious.面包店用新鲜浆果填充的甜馅饼很美味。

quiz.question: ____ wart
quiz.explanation: 疣,皮肤疣。The dermatologist removed the unsightly skin wart with liquid nitrogen.皮肤科医生用液氮去除了难看的皮肤疣。

quiz.question: thwart _____
quiz.explanation: 阻挠,阻挠计划。Bad weather threatened to thwart plans for the outdoor wedding.恶劣的天气威胁要阻挠户外婚礼的计划。

quiz.question: sherbert _____
quiz.explanation: 果汁冰糕,柠檬果汁冰糕。The children enjoyed the refreshing sherbert lemon on the hot summer day.孩子们在炎热的夏天享用了清爽的柠檬果汁冰糕。

quiz.question: disconcert ________
quiz.explanation: 使不安,使观众不安。The actor's forgotten lines began to disconcert audience members.演员忘记台词开始使观众不安。

quiz.question: avert ________
quiz.explanation: 避免,避免灾难。Quick action by the crew helped avert disaster when the engine failed.当引擎故障时,机组人员的快速行动帮助避免了灾难。

quiz.question: revert ____
quiz.explanation: 恢复,恢复原状。The software will revert back to the previous version if the update fails.如果更新失败,软件将恢复到以前的版本。
